timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Yahzee Skellington
timelineItems.text: .... we might be playing one of these teams if we make it to the next round :D #BELvALG #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Ira Alif Syabil
timelineItems.text: #ALG holding loads of possession early on.Early concerns for #BEL? #BELvALG #BELALG

timelineItems.name: Kate Johnson
timelineItems.text: Belgium v Algeria - an important game for US fans to watch. If we make it out of the group stage, prob playing one of them! #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Andrew Bennie
timelineItems.text: Algeria putting 3/4 guys on Hazard when he touches it. Poor guy's in for a long game. #BELvALG

timelineItems.text: 14': #BEL with early possession edge, #ALG very disciplined inside their own half. #BELvALG #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Leon Rosa
timelineItems.text: No need for slow motion in first 15 mins. Not exactly a high-tempo battle. #BELvALG

Foul by Nacer Chadli (Belgium).

timelineItems.name: Thomas Johnston  
timelineItems.text: Belgium plan. Lump it to Lukaku and see what happens #BELvALG #BEL

timelineItems.name: Bowyay
timelineItems.text: That Algerian was way too nervous obviously, should have slowed it down a touch, looked around, good move though #BELvALG

Soudani (Algeria) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Church of Soccer
timelineItems.text: Did you get your cappuccino with extra foam today? #BelgianDip #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Yahzee Skellington
timelineItems.text: ... 1 minute in... no goal yet #BELvALG #WorldCup #fail

timelineItems.name: Matt Oswin
timelineItems.text: Early Algeria goal would make this one interesting... #WorldCup #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Kieran.
timelineItems.text: Seventeen seconds in and Andy Townsend claims Hazard & Kompany could play for any international team. No Andy, they can’t! #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: On The Laces
timelineItems.text: So far even game between #BELvALG. Algeria not afraid to pass the ball on the ground so this should be a good test for Belgium. #WC2014

timelineItems.name: Ray Webster
timelineItems.text: Vertongen is killing every single move for Belgium. Way too slow on the ball and no movement. #worldcup #BELvALG

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Belgium 2, Algeria 1.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: There have been three scoreless first halves at this #WorldCup. Mexico has played two of them.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 13% - A higher % of goals have been scored at 2014 #WorldCup than any other finals - 1978 12%, 1994 11%, 1990 11%, 1998 10%. Spot @MacRob85

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 13% - A higher % of goals have been scored from penalties at 2014 #WorldCup than any other finals - 78 12%, 94 11%, 90 11%. Spot @MacRob85

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Busy #WorldCup day ahead: Netherlands & Chile could advance. Spain (!) is 1 of 4 teams that could be eliminated.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Brazil had been 17-0-0 at the #WorldCup vs non-UEFA/CONMEBOL teams, outscoring them 50-5.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup coverage: AUS-NED: 11:30 AM ET, ESPN ESP-CHI, 2:30 ET, ESPN CMR-CRO, 5:30 ET, ESPN

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 7 - Arjen Robben has scored seven goals in his last seven appearances for #NED. Threat. #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 11 - #NED are unbeaten in their last 11 #WorldCup group stage matches, winning eight and drawing three. Juggernaut.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Tim Cahill has five career #WorldCup goals. All other Australians have a total of five.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: 49 goals so far at the World Cup, most through 17 #WorldCup games since 1958.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Arjen Robben now has six career #WorldCup goals. Johnny Rep is the only Dutchman with more (7).

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Axel Witsel (Belgium) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Mousa Dembélé.

timelineItems.name: Derek
timelineItems.text: 18': Combination of lucky bounce and good touch gives Mahrez of #ALG an opening but he fires high and wide. Very wide. #BELvALG #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Bowyay
timelineItems.text: 20 minutes for the first Belgian chance to show up despite all their possession in the Algerian half, good one though good save too #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Bowyay
timelineItems.text: should only be a matter of time before they find the move to open Algeria up at this rate, Algeria need to use the counter well #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Michael CFC
timelineItems.text: Basically Belgium world class players are Courtois, Kompany & Hazard, the rest are bang average. People believing the hype. Haha #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Niall
timelineItems.text: On a hipster artisan bread scale, this #BelvAlg match has been a standard white batch loaf so far #WorldCup2014 #BEL

timelineItems.name: Matt Oswin
timelineItems.text: Penalty! Algeria #WorldCup #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: dksglen
timelineItems.text: Not in the script..#BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Soccer Gods
timelineItems.text: YOU. ARE. WELCOME. Man, this game needed this. #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Sanchit Mehra
timelineItems.text: Penalty to Algeria. #BELvALG #FIFAWorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: José_Ranjo
timelineItems.text: Bloody hell! Vertonghen has messed us up! Penalty to Algeria!! Total crap! 24' #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Anthony Oliva
timelineItems.text: "@KaylaKnappFOX: Somebody please do something because I can't stop yawning. #BELvALG" So far it's disappointing. I've picked BEL win it all

timelineItems.name: HITC Sport - Live
timelineItems.text: GOAL Belgium 0-1* Algeria FEGHOULI (pen 24') #BELvALG #BEL #ALG #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Avishkar Panday
timelineItems.text: What a stupid stupid foul by Vertonghen. Penalty to Algeria, and they score! #Brazil2014 #WorldCup #BELvALG #ssFootball

timelineItems.name: Kartik Krishnaiyer
timelineItems.text: WOW, Fortunate for Vertongen not to be sent off. #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Lewis Bazley
timelineItems.text: As a Spurs fan, that's no surprise. Verthonghen is fantastically skilled but can be lazy and stupid. #worldcup #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Justin Dowling
timelineItems.text: #Belgium down 1-0 against #Algeria. The question is can they hold that lead. I highly doubt it. #BELvALG #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Layla
timelineItems.text: NEVER thought I'd see the day where ALGERIA is beating BELGIUM. WOAH. #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Derek
timelineItems.text: 21': Stinging shot by Witsel from about 30 yards. Spectacular effort punched away. #BELvALG #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Rebecca Hindle
timelineItems.text: Penalty to Algeria #WorldCup #BElvALG scores 1-0 to Algeria blaten penalty

timelineItems.name: Ben Kilkenny
timelineItems.text: Vertongen deserves to be taken off , offers nothing going forward and looks like nothing going back #BELvALG #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Betfair
timelineItems.text: The dark horses on the way to the glue factory? #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Alyssa
timelineItems.text: Maybe this will force Belgium to open up their game and attack a bit more aggressively... #BELvALG #2014WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Alf Love
timelineItems.text: Oh dear, Verts caught napping & concedes penalty. Algeria go one up. Verts picks up a yellow. #WC2014 #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Kartik Krishnaiyer
timelineItems.text: This could be a dramatic upset if it holds. How many Algerians would actually make the Belgium squad? Probably zero. #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Soccer Gods
timelineItems.text: This is unfolding just like the Belgian Landon Donovan planned. #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Simon Fraser
timelineItems.text: Another ridiculous call that resulted in a PK for #Algeria ... #refsTakingover #BELvALG #worldcup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Mousa Dembélé (Belgium) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Vincent Kompany.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bullock
timelineItems.text: That makes his game interesting. Lots of people fancied Belgium. Interesting to see how they respond now #BELvALG #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Church of Soccer
timelineItems.text: The Algerian Jose Mourinho has parked the bus. RT @soccergods: This is unfolding just like the Belgian Landon Donovan planned. #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Mustafa Hameed
timelineItems.text: Big moment for Algerian soccer. And this is where the Belgium hype gets a reality check--sloppy back line #WorldCup #BelVAlg

timelineItems.name: fiveguys5sports
timelineItems.text: Algeria take a shock lead. Sofiane Feghouli converts the penalty after Jan Vertonghen hauls him down.#belvalg #BelAlg #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Sam Coleman
timelineItems.text: Corrupt World Cup. Pepe got sent off for head-butting but when 4 Algerians head-butt the ground after that goal, it's fine? #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Kieran.
timelineItems.text: They’re Belgian, Andy. That means they can only play for Belgium. Howay son, you get paid for this shit! #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: jerseygirls
timelineItems.text: Someone tell us how to feel about this Belgium team being behind right now. They are so good on paper! And in qualifying! #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: fiveguys5sports

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans

timelineItems.name: Rebecca Hindle
timelineItems.text: Belgium 0-1 Algeria penalty obvious penalty its boring Belgium playing at nought mile a hour #WorldCup #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Martin Čurristàn
timelineItems.text: Time to see if all the hype around Belgium turns out to be as good as Kevin De Bruyne #BEL

timelineItems.name: Success Banye

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Divock Origi (Belgium) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jan Vertonghen with a headed pass.

timelineItems.text: Aside from previous hosts and holders, no country has played in as many World Cup tournaments as Belgium (12). #BEL #BELvALG #Brasil2014

timelineItems.name: Austin Moore Farrow
timelineItems.text: Fascinating what happens in group G & H with these results. Algeria pull this out, it's the biggest upset so far no doubt. #2014WC #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: Very excited to see #BEL today, but #ALG have a way of frustrating their opponent and capitalizing on the quick counter #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: sb
timelineItems.text: Guessing a 4-2 win for Belgium! #BELvALG #worldcup

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: Interesting that Islam Slimani did not get the nod for #ALG, but his quality off the bench will be the ace in the hole for them #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Ray Webster
timelineItems.text: Im going for 3-0 Belgium against Algeria. Belgium are such a complete team. Havent had a scorline right in a while. #worldcup #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Mohamad Aziel Zaquan
timelineItems.text: 2014 FIFA World Cup Brazil: Group Stage: Round 1: Belgium vs Algeria #WorldCup2014 #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Iman Nugraha
timelineItems.text: so many great talents & exciting players in Belgium squad. Can't wait to see their performance on the pitch #BELvALG

timelineItems.text: Belgeria. #WorldCup #WorldCup2014 #BELvsALG #BELvALG

timelineItems.text: Star-studded lineup but Belgium isn't bringing anything. #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Time
timelineItems.text: Fellaini with a goal! 1-1 #BELvALG just hen I thought Mbolhi was impermeable! The match has officially started!

timelineItems.name: Peter Smith
timelineItems.text: Great header from Fallaini. Relief in the Kust and Binnenland. #BelvAlg #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Time
timelineItems.text: Fellaini with a goal! 1-1 #BELvALG just when I was starting to think Mbolhi was impermeable! The match has officially started!

timelineItems.name: Jordan Schildkraut
timelineItems.text: Wow the number of comebacks at this World Cup is insane #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Emily Akin
timelineItems.text: A nice strike from Mertens, but I do feel bad for #Algeria... #BELALG #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: Igor Dubinskiy
timelineItems.text: Belgium on the counter! Hazard with a great pass, Mertins with a great run and finish. They definitely deserve the win. #BELvALG #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Jeremy Gan
timelineItems.text: What a turnaround. For everyone who criticize Wilmots for taking Lukaku out is #clueless. What a strike by Mertens! #BELvALG

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: #BEL did so well to adjust at half time, and hats off to Wilmots for making changes quickly to get the result that was expected #BELvALG

timelineItems.text: Belgium look a totally different team now and Fellaini looks a totally different player. #worldcup #BELvALG

timelineItems.text: Taken 80 mins but I think that's the Belgium everyone expected to see. Great cutting pass & powerful strike. Beauty! #WorldCup2014 #BELvALG
